short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extention that allows you to switch between github issues without going back to the issues list page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever go though issues on the GitHub with your team? Then you know how annoying to go back and forth between issues and issues list just to jump to the next issue? This extension will simply add two buttons to your GitHub issue page to switch to the next and previous issue
